description: Gaius Octavius, later known as Augustus created a series of laws between 30 BCE and 2 BCE that transformed the constitution of the Roman Republic into the Constitution of the Roman Empire.  One of which created a standing army of approximately 28 legions consisting of 5,000-6,000 professional soldiers.
tooltip: Convert Infantry to Marian Legionaries, and cavalry to Auxiliaries, and citizen spearmen to conscript infantry. Unlock Onagers and Centurions.
